mapper.insert: MERGE INTO BOOKS USING dual ON (isbn = ${isbn}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (bookkey, title, description, link, isbn, author, publisher, image) values (book_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{description}, #{link}, #{isbn}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{image})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM books
where title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where author LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where publisher LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

SELECT bookkey , title , description , link , isbn , author , publisher , image FROM ( SELECT bookkey , title , description , link , isbn , author , publisher , image , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOOKKEY DESC) AS RNUM from books ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} order by bookkey desc
SELECT COUNT(bookkey) FROM books WHERE bookkey > 0
